timestamp.description: Last update timestamp in ISO 8601 Date time string format YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ss.sss

user.description: The id of the user who did the update.

language.description: Three-letter language code indicating the default language for the publisher.

body.description: Body template for the message encoded as Base64.

userId.description: Identifier of the user in the external authentication provider.

defaultLanguage.description: Three-letter language code. Defaults to the language defined in the publisher metadata (In case of the user having permissions to multiple publishers, the default is taken from the first publisher in the list or permissions). For administrators defaults to fin.

timestamp.description: Last update timestamp in ISO 8601 Date time string format YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ss.sss

user.description: The id of the user who did the update.

publishers.description: An array of identifiers of the publishers the user should have permission to.

notes.description: A list of notes encoded as Base64.

state.description: Request state. Can be one of new, inProgress, processed.

timestamp.description: Last update timestamp in ISO 8601 Date time string format YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ss.sss

user.description: The id of the user who did the update.

timestamp.description: Last update timestamp in ISO 8601 Date time string format YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ss.sss

user.description: The id of the user who did the update.

language.description: Three-letter language code indicating the default language for the publisher

metadataDelivery.description: The publisher's metadata delivery type. Either manual or external.

primaryContact.description: Primary contact points. An array of strings which can be email addresses or user identifiers.

email.description: Public email address of the publisher

website.description: URL of the publisher's public website

aliases.description: A list of alternative publisher's names

items.description: A list of notes encoded as Base64.

active.description: Whether the publisher is active or not.

yearInactivated.description: The year the publisher became inactive. Can only be present when active is false.

id.description: Identifier of the created publisher creation request

language.description: Three-letter language code indicating the default language for the publisher

email.description: Public email address of the publisher

website.description: URL of the publisher's public website

publicationEstimate.description: An estimate of publication per year

notes.description: A list of notes encoded as Base64.

state.description: Request state. Can be one of new, inProgress, processed.

publication.description: An optional property which has has the structure of either ISBN-ISMN or ISSN publication request.

timestamp.description: Last update timestamp in ISO 8601 Date time string format YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ss.sss

user.description: The id of the user who did the update.

melindaId.description: Identifier of the corresponding metadata record in Melinda.

publisher.description: Identifier of the publisher of this publication

type.description: Publication type. Can be one of: book, dissertation, music, other

publicationTime.description: Publication time in ISO 8601 Date time string format YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ss.sss

role.description: Role of the author. Can be one of: author, illustrator, translator, editor

identifier.description: Identifier of the publication (e.g. ISBN or ISSN). Mutually exclusive with name.

name.description: Name of the publication. Mutually exclusive with identifier.

electronicdetails.description: An optional property describing details of the electronic publication.

printDetails.description: An optional property describing details of the printed publication.

mapDetails.description: An optional property describing details of map publications.
